I believe this issue is similar to the one on AIX -- Bug 200672, and both bugs share the same root cause -- Bug 77217, the browser widget is not supported on Solaris or AIX.

The circumvention mentioned on the http://wiki.eclipse.org/BIRT_Community_Tested_Operating_Environments_for_2.2.1 page would seem to be a temporary workaround.

As Zhiqiang mentioned in https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=200672#c9, BIRT should probably check on the existence of the embedded browser, and if it does not exist, switch to use the external browser.
If this change does not involve significant rework, is it possible to target the fix in BIRT 2.2.2?  I believe it would benefit several Unix-based platforms.
